gearList.desc: My Personal computer that i used.
A low profile mechanical keyboard with brown gateron switches.
Just a regular mouse with a gaming gimmick that fit in my palm.
My main monitor that big enough to fill my desk, this one is 24" but it's curved, idk why i bought this.
Pretty awesome headphones. I used the Arctis 5 before, this is just a nice upgrade. No more cables. uh I forget the chat mix feature is awesome!
I switch between my Buds and my Arctis 7. I used Buds more often when am outside or in my office. I love the noise cancelling support and you can connect 2 bluetooth sources at the same time.
Bruh everyone use this, it had a lot of extension and easy to customize.
A BLAZINGLY FAST text editor that i use when am on the terminal.
Windows window management sucks. Tools like Spectaccle and Moom make things way better. However, this tool is a bit more magically and really works nicely.
Formerly known as Now from Zeit. This is a very nice platform to directly deploy all my Next.js apps.
This is a very nice platform to directly deploy all my HTML
